response.overview: A DOCUMENTARY INTO THE INFAMOUS ILLEGAL LOS ANGELES STREET TAKEOVERS.  FEATURING: Foodstamps, SSnoopy, Stevofilmz , E-Bandz, Al Profit.  Music By: N8Noface, LNDN DRGS, Zoe Osama, G Perico, E-40, Larry June, King Lil G, Drummer Boy, Austin the Pac-Man, 2TONE,  DJ Quik, The Game, Drake the Ruler.  Shot over the course of 2 years in Compton and South Central. A raw and up close look at one of the most controversial topics in the car community today, The “takeovers “which comes from “sideshows” which originate in the Bay Area.
response.title: SLIDE
